resources.string: Welcome to the Quiz App. Find out your knowledge about Films from 2018.
1. How many Jurassic Park/World films have been released in total including this year\'s Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom?
2. What is the name of the virtual reality world in Ready Player One?
3. Tom Hardy plays journalist Eddie Brock in which Marvel Comics superhero film released in October 2018?
4. Who of the following actors starred in Mission: Impossible - Fallout? (answer all correct)
5. \'Solo\' is latest release from which famous movie franchise?
